I am super excited to launch Tanka - the messenger with AI long-term memory for teams, which auto-replies to your emails and Slack messages accurately, and helps you summarize and retrieve complex information fast. It's an üí¨IM + ü§ñAI + üß†your memory bank.


üß†¬†What does Tanka do?

Tanka serves as your team‚Äôs AI second brain that learns from your past conversations, context, tones and styles to deliver fast and precise AI Smart Replies, saving you hours of drafting messages and emails.


üéØ¬†What is unique about Tanka?

Tanka goes beyond just another business chat platform ‚Äî

  • As a unified communication hub, Tanka integrates with your existing workflows like WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Outlook, Telegram and more.

  • As your AI-powered work assistant, Tanka delivers context-rich smart replies, timely reminders, and actionable insights at your fingertips.

  • As your personalized work memory bank, Tanka captures, organizes and surfaces your key achievements, insights, decisions, and todos withouts leaving your chat groups.

  • Inspired by a decade of neuroscience research and built on a proprietary memory knowledge graph and multi-agent framework, Tanka is pioneering the future of AI memory-first productivity.

üëã¬†Say goodbye to Organizational Amnesia & AI Forgetfulness.

Tanka addresses the following pain points:

  • 1Ô∏è‚É£ Tired of answering the repetitive questions on Slack or WhatsApp? Let Tanka handle it.

  • 4Ô∏è‚É£¬†Struggling with lost information and siloed decisions? Tanka ensures key insights are captured and shared effortlessly, helping you to make informed intelligent decisions.

  • 5Ô∏è‚É£¬†Today‚Äôs AI assistants forget like goldfish üê†‚Äîno long-term memory, no true business context. No more repeating prompts. Tanka remembers, delivering context-aware AI replies.

What's great

Fantastic product. Excellent at taking ideas and concepts into testable code. Great time saving and awesome for reminding you where your at.

What needs improvement

Mobile could be enhanced. I am working exclusively on my iPhone and for example I was working on something rather lengthy and I was almost at the end and the conversation disappeared?

vs Alternatives

Honestly I have zero budget and Tanka let me accomplish more than any alternative I found.

I have found that Tanka is better at this than most of the other AI‚Äôs

I didn‚Äôt play with this aspect.
